9 This information supports the information needs of financial market participants subject to Regulation (EU) 2019/2088 because
it is derived from a mandatory indicator related to principal adverse impacts as set out by indicator #6 in Table I of
Annex I of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/1288 with regard to disclosure rules on sustainable investments (“Energy
